carlhauser_client.EvaluationTools.SimilarityGraphExtractor package¶

Submodules¶

carlhauser_client.EvaluationTools.SimilarityGraphExtractor.similarity_graph_extractor module¶

class carlhauser_client.EvaluationTools.SimilarityGraphExtractor.similarity_graph_extractor.GraphExtractor[source]¶

Bases: object

get_proximity_graph(image_folder: pathlib.Path, output_path: pathlib.Path) → common.Graph.graph_datastructure.GraphDataStruct[source]¶

Extract a proximity graph from a folder of pictures, sent to DB and requested one by one. :param image_folder: The folder of picture to send and request, to build the similarity graph from :param output_path: The output path where the graph and other data will be stored :return: the proximity graph

static results_list_to_graph(requests_list, nb_match: int = 1) → common.Graph.graph_datastructure.GraphDataStruct[source]¶

Construct a graph from results list of requests on the database Hypothesis : All database pictures are requested pictures Edges are colored : from green to red depending on the match index (Best is green) :param requests_list: a List of results extracted from server :param nb_match: Number of matches per pictures to add to the graph (1=first level match/best match, 2 = 2 best match per picture, etc.) :return: A graph datastructure

carlhauser_client.EvaluationTools.SimilarityGraphExtractor.similarity_graph_extractor.test()[source]¶

carlhauser_client.EvaluationTools.SimilarityGraphExtractor.similarity_graph_quality_evaluator module¶

class carlhauser_client.EvaluationTools.SimilarityGraphExtractor.similarity_graph_quality_evaluator.similarity_graph_quality_evaluator[source]¶

Bases: object

compute_score_for_one_threshold(list_results: List, gt_graph: common.Graph.graph_datastructure.GraphDataStruct, dist_threshold: float) → common.PerformanceDatastructs.stats_datastruct.Stats_datastruct[source]¶

Compute stats about the quality of a result (requests_result), given a specific threshold (dist_threshold) and compared to a ground truth graph (gt_graph) :param list_results: Result of a similarity request to server :param gt_graph: Ground truth file to provide to compute if matches are good or not :param dist_threshold: threshold to apply to the results to compare to ground truth graph :return: stats about the quality of a result

get_perf_list(list_results: List, gt_graph: common.Graph.graph_datastructure.GraphDataStruct, output_folder: pathlib.Path = None) → List[common.PerformanceDatastructs.perf_datastruct.Perf][source]¶

Extract a list of performance datastructure from a list of results (list_results) compared to a ground truth file (gt_graph). Can store provided list and ground truth results if a (output_folder) is given. :param list_results: The list of results extracted from server (one result for each node of the graph) :param gt_graph: The ground truth file that serves as reference :param output_folder: Faculatative output folder to save inputs :return: a list of performance datastructure, each having a threshold and a stats datastructure. This means that for each computed threshold, we know the quality of the graph.

static is_correct(result: Dict)[source]¶

Checks if a request result is valid to be evaluated. Check if it has enough matches, if correctly formatted … :param result: One request result from server :return: True if correct, Error if problem
